values:
Each night a cat pisses up against and each morning I awake to its stink. I hate that cat, and yet it is just a cat doing its thing. Against my temporary home. In my real home in Moldova a different animal pisses on my home; the beast of oppression. Just as I hiss at the cat to chase it away, so my music must hiss at the oppressors to speed them away.

Harmony must be a cacophony enough to make bleed the ears of the oppressors.

Deaf to the oppressors.
http://vodinkja.livejournal.com/4439.html

I was locked up for eight long years, now I am free I lock myself up in my container.
I am comforted by the sound of the key in the padlock, it sings to me in my sleep and calls me each morning.
I do not know where the last two weeks have gone, they just slipped away while I was not looking. Maybe someone stole the days from my calendar, but it is hard to say since someone stole my calendar because I forgot to lock up.
http://vodinkja.livejournal.com/4189.html

I am mongrel.

I was born Moldovan and Moldovan I will die, but many think me foreigner.

My mother was Romanian. Her father was Romanian, her mother was Russian. It pains me to say this but it is true. Her mother's mother was Georgian.

My father was Moldovan and his mother was Moldovan. My father's father was a Serb. It is said My father's father's mother was a granddaughter of a Turkish sultan, but nobody knows where this story came from. It is probably the lies of a dog.

The mongrel dog bites as hard as a pedigree, and harder than a toothless old man.
http://vodinkja.livejournal.com/3851.html

Got only as far as Hereford and got wet. Wetter than any time since my old brother threw me in the Dniester to teach me swimming and I nearly drown. I have rotten feet from my wet Moldovan army boots and my papers are all fallen apart. I found no new members for Vodinkja and no good wines. Have been to a shop and bought a bottle of Chilean wine from Chile. It is too fruity for me, I like it sharp as vinegar. Hereford is very strange place do you not think?
http://vodinkja.livejournal.com/3733.html

Friends. This end of the week I am going away for three days. I am to go and look for new band members for UK release this Summertime. I am going to Hereford, Manchester, Liverpool, Peterborough and Deal to search for newe great people. I will be busy and staying with friends of friend Michael all this time. I will not be getting to a computer to bring forth my message. Hopefully, out of these five cities I will bring forth new harmony and uplifting of spirits. I am hoping to find new wine to drink also. Huzzah!
http://vodinkja.livejournal.com/3559.html
http://vodinkja.livejournal.com/3156.html

This is outside brothel where Vodinkja played benefit concert in Leipzig Germany.

The flag is false, East Germany was already a memory in these days, but Limni found it used as a towel and wanted to hang it out. He earned himself two days in prison for assaulting a policeman who removed it. He missed the concert, but it was still a storm. The women of the brothel made much money from the spectators, and one of them had a brother who was a pocket picker who also made much money that night.

The brothel is now a buddhist monastery. The pocket picker is now a monk. The women are all gone. I would like to play concert there agian for the monks.
http://vodinkja.livejournal.com/2987.html

Friends, I am yearning.

The drum of the enemies of harmonious peace still beats in my homeland, and I am yearning for to do battle with it. I wish to drown it in glorious harmony. I long for the high days of Pritev Radio Tiraspol, for the melody of the organ to cut through the static roar.

From out of chaos came forth a melody, and that melody was as pure as a piglet's flesh.

I will soon bring forth my own piglet's flesh and sweep aside the din of Government thought. Hail the harmony. Hail the free melody.
http://vodinkja.livejournal.com/2665.html

I sleep at night with this picture of my proud father under my rolled up hunting coat which I use as pillow. He was great Blaghorn player in his senior scouting unit, and a true free man.

Alas! He was killed doing what he loved the most. He was blowing his horn as a female scout was blowing him and his artery in his brain gave out. He died in seconds. A valorous man. If I die half the death of him I will be proud to Heaven.
http://vodinkja.livejournal.com/2365.html

Friend Michael is a special man. He is letting me use his container for a home, an his computer for my battle siren. It's call shall be heard by soldiers. Soldiers for a war on oppression. Only when people see that they are not free to choose shall they rise up and snatch freedom from the oppressors' grip. the people shall see the oppressors' treachery. See that they give with one hand, but wield the small knife with the other. We shall turn that knife with our song; strong voices will bring down their watchtower, our art shall be our banner, our freedom to resist will be unbound. We will never subjugate ourselves infront of their feet as a dog laps at the feet of the hunters horse. 

This wine of Michael's is very good.
http://vodinkja.livejournal.com/2176.html

I have only three photos from the old days. This is our old tourbus.
From left to right; Limni, Szuko and Piotr who drove the thing. I loved that bus and many times Limni had girls stay with him in the night in it. We made him cleanse it each morning as he is a filthy dog.
http://vodinkja.livejournal.com/1857.html

Red wine is a treacherous friend. He was very good for me last night, but in the night he hit me over the head with hammer and now he is gone and I am left with a head that is sore. If you see him, tell him I am as mad as a bull with ants up his nose and I will smash his pretty green bottle and cast his cork to the waves to be consumed by fishes. 

I am just now recovering from his deed. Moldovan government wine did not do this to me, but then it was impossible to drink three bottles of the stuff, one would render an ox incompetent because of the chemicals they put in it to keep people from singing political songs too loud. They do not wish to have freedom through harmony as we do my brothers. 

Freedom through harmony. Freedom through art. Freedom through a fine Merlot.
http://vodinkja.livejournal.com/1551.html

A tip for all instrument bastardisers.

Unplug from mains electricity before connecting back up. I am hurting from the finger now as I just have elactric shock treatment from a kettle whilst connecting it to a Rocktek distortion pedal. I want to boil water on stage and amp it up the sound like a crescendo to atomic explosion. And then make a cup of tea for Limni who likes it black with two sugar lumps.

Ah. On stage. After eight years it will feel good to be on stage again. I must do it alone or find some new boys as my team are all back in Moldova, either behing bars in prison or in bars drinking dogs piss beer. I am drinking red wine and it is good.
http://vodinkja.livejournal.com/1320.html

Does anyone have a light?
I need to burn some effigies.
http://vodinkja.livejournal.com/1024.html

I have a cup of wine in my hand. This is joy. Eight long years since I last tasted wine, and then that was just only govenment wine of Tiraspol, weak as termite piss and taste as the same. Midday is the best time of day to raise to glass to brothers in amps across the world. Hail!

Wine is the blood of men, vodka is the blood of women, beer is the spit of dogs.
http://vodinkja.livejournal.com/839.html

I have been free now for forty two days. Have spent them travelling across Europe to UK to find friends and restart my mission to bring freedom of harmony through music and art to my Homeland. Am learning how this computer I borrowed from friend Michael is working. Through the medium of this journal I will build a virtual army to flood the world with our message:

A foot can squash an ant with ease; yet many ants can build a nest underground to escape the foot

Be with me my brothers.
http://vodinkja.livejournal.com/625.html
